class.name: SpineSlotData
class.brief_description: Stores the setup pose for a slot.
class.description: Stores the setup pose for a slot.

method.name: get_attachment_name
method.description: The name of the attachment that is visible for this slot in the setup pose, or null if no attachment is visible.

method.name: get_blend_mode
method.description: The blend mode for drawing the slot's attachment.

method.name: get_bone_data
method.description: The bone this slot belongs to.

method.name: get_color
method.description: The color used to tint the slot's attachment. If {@link #getDarkColor()} is set, this is used as the light color for two color tinting. Modifying the color has no effect.

method.name: get_dark_color
method.description: The dark color used to tint the slot's attachment for two color tinting, or null if two color tinting is not used. The dark color's alpha is not used. Modifying the color has no effect.

method.name: get_index
method.description: The index of the slot in [code]Skeleton.get_slots()[/code].

method.name: get_name
method.description: The name of the slot, which is unique across all slots in the skeleton.

method.name: has_dark_color
method.description: Whether the slot has a dark color.
